titleStmt.title: The sounding of the two last trumpets, the sixt and seventh or Meditations by way of paraphrase upon the 9th. 10th. and 11th. Chapters of the Revelation, as containing a prophecie of these last times. / Digested by Henry Burton during his banishment, and close imprisonment in the isle of Guernsey.
titleStmt.author: Burton, Henry, 1578-1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Samuel Gellibrand at the Brazen Serpent in Pauls church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Brazen Serpent in Pauls church-yard
